long_description: The Tifosi Radius interchangable sunglasses for women include 3 lenses, making them a versatile choice for multisport athletes. Frame includes 3 sets of lenses (gray, red and clear tints) that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Gray GT (golf and tennis) lens helps illuminate balls; red EC (extreme contrast) lens helps distinguish details in the terrain-great for runs and biking. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact-resistance in all temperatures. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits small to medium faces. Tifosi Radius interchangable sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Tifosi Radius interchangable sunglasses for women include 3 lenses, making them a versatile choice for multisport athletes.
